mapper.select: select count(*) from transaction where sellerId=#{id};
select count(*) from transaction where buyerId=#{id};
SELECT DISTINCT p1.*, p2.* FROM transaction t join person p1 ON t.sellerId = p1.id JOIN person p2 ON t.buyerId = p2.id WHERE t.sellerId = #{sellerId} AND t.auctionNum = #{auctionNum};
UPDATE transaction SET state='f' WHERE auctionNum = #{auctionNum};

SELECT t.transactionNum as transactionNum, t.sellerId as sellerId, t.auctionNum as auctionNum, t.price as price, t.date as date, t.state as state, c.companyName as companyName, c.id as companyId, a.maxSalary as maxSalary, a.title as auctionTitle FROM Transaction t JOIN Company c ON t.buyerId = c.id JOIN Auction a ON t.auctionNum = a.auctionNum WHERE c.id = #{companyId} AND t.date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY t.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PERSON WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM AUCTION WHERE auctionNum = #{auctionNum})
SELECT a.* FROM transaction t JOIN auction a ON t.auctionNum = a.auctionNum WHERE t.buyerId = #{companyId}
SELECT * FROM bid b JOIN `transaction` t ON b.auctionNum = t.auctionNum WHERE t.auctionNum = #{auctionNum} ORDER BY b.bidDate ASC;

SELECT t.transactionNum as transactionNum, t.sellerId as sellerId, t.auctionNum as auctionNum, t.price as price, t.date as date, t.state as state, c.companyName as companyName, c.id as companyId, a.maxSalary as maxSalary, a.title as auctionTitle, p.personImage AS personImage FROM Transaction t JOIN Company c ON t.buyerId = c.id JOIN Auction a ON t.auctionNum = a.auctionNum JOIN person p ON t.sellerId = p.id WHERE c.id = #{companyId} AND t.date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY t.date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
